attributes.action: Make all BBC Channels Pay Per View
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give people a choice on whether or not to watch BBC Channels. Do away with the outdated Licence fee and make it pay per view.
Therefore people who do not watch any BBC programmes or listen to BBC Radio, do not get charged. 
People who find the BBC programmes good Quality, will not mind paying for it, Via Pay Per View.
